head.supplied: ¶ The Society for Botany at Hamburg has in today's meeting elected Baron Dr Ferdinand von Mueller as its Honorary Member and had the present certificate drawn up concerning it. ¶ Hamburg, 19 January ...

div.p: From the Gesellschaft für Botanik, Hamburg
RB MSS M200.b29, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a certificate accompanied by a letter Both the certificate and the letter bear the stamp of the Society.

p.seg: Die Gesellschaft für Botanik zu Hamburg

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Herrn Baron Dr Ferdinand von Müller

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: zu ihrem Ehren-Mitgliede erwählt und darüber gegenwärtiges Diplom ausfertigen lassen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Hamburg, am 19. Januar 1882.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The Society for Botany at Hamburg has in today's meeting elected Baron Dr Ferdinand von Mueller as its Honorary Member and had the present certificate drawn up concerning it.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Hamburg, 19 January 1882.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Ew. Hochwohlgeboren erlauben wir uns beileigendes Diplom zu übersenden, mit der ergebensten Bitte, diesen Beweis unsrer besonderen Hochachtung Ihrer grossen Verdienste um die wissenschaftliche Botanik gütigst aufnehmen zu wollen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Sadebeck

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Vorsitzender der Gesellsch. f. Bot. zu Hamburg

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Hamburg d. 19. January 1882

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Die Gesellschaft für Botanik zu Hamburg

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: An Herrn Baron Dr. phil. Ferdinand v. Müller Hochwohlgeboren

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: in Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Your Honour, we permit ourselves to send the enclosed certificate with the most humble request that you be willing to most kindly accept this proof of our particular esteem for your great service to scientific botany.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Sadebeck

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Chairman of the Society of Botany, Hamburg

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Hamburg 19 January 1882

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The Society of Botany, Hamburg.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: To the Honorable Baron Dr phil Ferdinand von Mueller

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: in Melbourne
